attributes.additional_details:
Dogs are being put on death row to be kilt just because police think they are pit bull breed and because of that reason they are put to sleep.

But Not every  pit bull dog is dangerous.  And the ones that are not should be re-homed not put to sleep too.

Also these owners that make there dogs aggressive and make them fight and attack should be banned from having animals for life and also should get a longer prison sentence

Save these innocent dogs and sign the e - petition
